name: Blossoming Roots
description:
Blossoming Roots

Just grow

Made during Global Game Jam 2023

A relaxing game where you just have to grow your roots to make sure your tree gets the resources it needs

/!\ Sounds DO NOT WORK in Web build right now /!\

/!\ Download recommended as sounds are a main part of the gameplay /!\

Controls : 

ZQSD / Directional arrows : move selection

Space / Enter : place roots

P / Escape : pause game

Credits : 

Adrien "Arias" Maginot : Project Manager, Game Designer, Developer

Anaïs "Café" Trinquet : Developer

Adam "Ev" EL GERSSIFI : Sound Designer, Composer

Quentin "KZ" Pepe : Developer

Florian "Omis" Lentz : UI Developer

Marius "Wouali" MALOT : Graphic Designer, Artist
